author: Choo Han Teck J:
casenumber: Suit No 434 of 2014 (Summons Nos 6150, 6151, 6152 of 2014 and 1482 of 2015)
casename: Parakou Shipping Pte Ltd (in liquidation) v Liu Cheng Chan and others
